ecosystem.description: Interested in adding your dApp to our dApp Store and earning revenue?
ecosystem.discover: Discover a diverse array of innovative apps
ecosystem.noInstantdApps: This dApp will open in a new browser tab.

instantdApps.title: Instant dApps
instantdApps.description: Discover the power of cross-chain apps - instantly, in one place

title.allInstant: Explore the {{count}} Instant dApps on Evmos
title.fewInstant: Explore the {{categoryName}} Instant dApps on Evmos
title.manyInstant: Explore the {{count}} Instant {{categoryName}} dApps on Evmos

categories.description: Explore the Evmos Ecosystem - dApps, tools, exchanges, infrastructure, and more.

all.name: All
all.description: Discover the power of cross-chain apps - instantly, in one place.

notFound.title: No results found.
notFound.description: Try another search query or change your filter settings.

wormhole.disruption: We are currently in maintenance mode with the Wormhole bridge. This will be addressed by the next upgrade of the Evmos chain.

instantdApp.singInToInteract: Please sign in order to interact with the

deleteModal.title: Are you sure?
deleteModal.subtitle: We're sorry to see you go!
deleteModal.description: By deleting your profile, all your data, including profile details, progress and activity, will be permanently removed. If you wish to recreate the account, you will have to set up all your information from the beginning.
deleteModal.acknowledge: I acknowledge that my progress will be deleted.

reconnect.title: Re-connect your wallet.
reconnect.body: Your wallet seems to have been disconnected - you need proper wallet connection in order to interact with dApps on the dApp Store.

modal.title: Sign in to access all dApps
modal.cancel.title: Are you sure you want to skip this step?
modal.cancel.body: Without verification, you won't be able to interact with any dApps on the Store. We recommend you to verify your address.
modal.body: In order to interact with dApps, you need to verify your wallet by signing the off-chain transaction in your wallet.

favorites.title: Favorites
favorites.description:
Pin your favorite dApps here.

You can do this by going into a dApp page and starring it.

reconnect.title: Re-connect your wallet.
reconnect.body: It seems like your wallet's been disconnected - re-connect to continue using the dApp Store.

mismatch.title: There's a mismatch of addresses.
mismatch.body: Manage your profile: Sign in to another profile or connect to your original address in your wallet.

share.description: Hey, check out this cool dApp I discovered on the Evmos dApp Store!

manageProfile.title: Manage Profile
manageProfile.description: There's currently a mismatch of connected addresses in your profile and your wallet. Either sign in to another profile or connect to your original address.
